original_text: Then Samuel said to the people, “It is the Lord who appointed Moses and Aaron and brought your ancestors up out of Egypt.
korean_text: 사무엘이 백성에게 이르되 모세와 아론을 세우시며 너희 조상들을 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내신 이는 여호와이시니

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel said to the people
It is the Lord who appointed Moses and Aaron
and brought your ancestors up out of Egypt
